item.title: How to Restore the Microsoft Windows Clock (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Restore the Microsoft Windows Clock: With Click With Double Click With Menu With Right Click No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: See a tutorial video: How to Restore the Microsoft Windows Clock With Click Step 1: First maximize Windows Clock. In the upper right corner, click the “Maximize” button. How to Restore the Microsoft Windows Clock With Double Click Step 1: Maximize Windows Clock.
